member.name: D2D1_PIXEL_FORMAT
member.summary: Contains the data format and alpha mode for a bitmap or render target.

member.name: D2D1_PIXEL_FORMAT.format
member.summary: A value that specifies the size and arrangement of channels in each pixel.

member.name: D2D1_PIXEL_FORMAT.alphaMode
member.summary: A value that specifies whether the alpha channel is using pre-multiplied alpha, straight alpha, whether it should be ignored and considered opaque, or whether it is unknown.
